titleStmt.title: Conformity re-asserted in an echo to R.S., or, A return of his VVord to Doctor Womock's asserting 1. That modification of publick worship by personal abilities is not the formal act of the ministerial office, 2. That the ministers of the Church of England ought to submit to the use of an imposed liturgy : and dissolving the objections of Mr. Crofton and R.S. to the contrary / by L.W. ...
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

titleStmt.title: Conformity re-asserted in an echo to R.S., or, A return of his VVord to Doctor Womock's asserting 1. That modification of publick worship by personal abilities is not the formal act of the ministerial office, 2. That the ministers of the Church of England ought to submit to the use of an imposed liturgy : and dissolving the objections of Mr. Crofton and R.S. to the contrary / by L.W. ...
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for Thomas Clark ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Womock by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"R.S. may be identified as Ralph Smith, Crofton's publisher and editor"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
